Class MessageForger

  • java.lang.Object
    • MessageForger

  • public class MessageForger
extends java.lang.Object
    This class only contains static method. Theses methods are forging a JCoincheMessage Google Protocol Buffer with specified type Object which is given to the JCoincheUtils.writeAndFlush static methods.
    See Also:
    JCoincheUtils.writeAndFlush(Channel, Object)

      Constructor and Description
